"Chitose": "You and Kirishima both, thanks so much. I ain't gonna forget how much I owe you two!"
"Listen, I've got this favor to ask; will ya hear me out?"
"So yeah, the enemies in Mediola... uh, Section 2... are all yours. I also wanna see you fight again."
"Awww, for real? Well, I guess it can't be helped if you're busy."
"I learned a lot from seeing you fight. This'll serve as a great reference."
"Alright, I'm gonna give it my all!!"
